content: in this legal case the court has issued a final resolution regarding the dissolution of a community property the court has ordered the division of assets which include a storage room and a real estate unit in santegidio del monte albino with a total value of €180400 the parties involved have received a total amount of €47355 with one party receiving €15785 the court has also ordered the transcription of the judgment and the allocation of expenses related to the division the court has considered the arguments of a mortgage creditor but determined that they do not affect the division additionally damages have been awarded to one party due to the unfounded defenses of the other party the court has made a final decision rejecting any objections and has ordered the dissolution of the community property and its division among the parties the remaining balance is to be paid by one of the parties the court has also arranged for the judgment to be transcribed and has allocated the expenses related to the division furthermore the court has determined that one party should reimburse onethird of the litigation costs amounting to €11400 while the other party should reimburse the remaining twothirds the court has also ordered the reimbursement of flatrate expenses and outofpocket expenses the decision was made on may 28 2021 and filed in the clerks office on july 15 2021

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Nocera Inferiore sez. II, 15/07/2021, n.974
